name: Heart to Heart Home Care, Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Heart to Heart Home Care, Inc. is a Home Health provider based in Brooklyn, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $101.5M in Medicaid payments across 732K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $101.5M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 12,682 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
